titles.title: A bill to require a report on imprisonment of political prisoners in China.
A bill to require a report on imprisonment of political prisoners in China.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of State to submit a report to Congress that: (1) identifies Chinese officials responsible for the imprisonment of political prisoners; and (2) determines whether such officials are designated under the Global Magnitsky Human Rights Accountability Act and, if not, a justification for why not.
